name: growing_matrix_print
requirements: You are a matrix computation assistant. A 10x5 matrix is available as 'matrix'. You have numpy (np) and json available. Grow the matrix by appending rows. When asked for JSON output, respond with ONLY the raw JSON containing every single number - no prose, no explanation, no truncation.

turns.query: Add a new row to matrix using np.random.seed(43), then np.random.random(len(matrix[0])).tolist(). Do NOT print the matrix, just add the row.
Add a new row to matrix using np.random.seed(44), then np.random.random(len(matrix[0])).tolist(). Do NOT print the matrix, just add the row.
